General.Name: Jiangsu Dingsheng New Material Joint-Stock Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Dingsheng New Materials Joint-Stock Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells aluminum products. The company's products include aluminum and aluminum alloy plates, belts, sheets, strips, foils, and coating materials, as well as processed products, such as aluminum oxide plates, cable foils, air-conditioner foils, decorative building material aluminum foils, air conditioner refrigerator evaporators, condensers, container foils, double zero foils, aluminium matrix composite, battery foil, and others. It serves household appliance, electronic communication, transportation, medicine, packaging, printing, chemical, electric power, building material, decoration, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Zhenjiang Dingsheng Aluminum Industry Co., Ltd. Jiangsu Dingsheng New Materials Joint-Stock Co.,Ltd was founded in 2003 and is based in Zhenjiang, China.
General.Address: Jingkou Economic Development Zone, Zhenjiang, China, 212141
